libelftc License

The drsyms library contains libelftc code (http://elftoolchain.sourceforge.net/) in binary form for obtaining file and line information from DWARF2 debug information on Linux and Cygwin/MinGW. That libelftc code has the following copyright and license:

Copyright (c) 2006-2012 Kai Wang, Joseph Koshy, et al. Copyright (c) 1990-2005 The Regents of the University of California, et al. All rights reserved.
